2025-03.title: is it true hardly anyone uses facebook anymore and it is becoming a relic
found out how to customize what you see on facebook without all the extra crap
2025-03.body:
its not perfect but go to where your settings are and click on feeds and then you can see posts from actual friends or groups or pages that you do follow 

to the commenter whos gonna say just delete facebook yes youre so cool unique and awesome and everyone should be like you

2025-03.title: facebook groups are full of bots  scams and fake accounts looking at it rn
2025-03.body: does anyone else feel like facebook groups are scam like im trying to find clients through facebook its been 3 months and i feel everyone out there are scam  bots and fake id help please

2025-03.title: is there any point to hide allfrom the constant barrage of fb content
2025-03.body:
when fb went to hell a month or two ago i thought i could at least train the algorithm a little by telling it what i dont want to see ive probably hide alld a couple hundred pages by now and its still just as bad as ever

in all honestly i would delete the app but i frequently use marketplace to buy and sell and do appreciate certain community updates im just done with the cruft

2025-03.title: why do things i post on someone elses timeline also show on my own timeline
2025-03.body:
for the past couple of months when i post a birthday with on a friends timeline it also shows on my own timeline making it look like i screwed up and posted on my own by mistake

also there have been several occasions when i posted an image and duplicate sometimes 3 copies posts were created  if i add text it shows on all of the idential posts

2025-03.title: who are the others who saw my close friends only story i checked the privacy and its definitely for a small group of people and they are all still on my friends list  when i refresh the list it sometimes eliminates the others but sometimes it doesnt
2025-03.body:
anyone else have this problem or know whats going on 
i just want to know if facebook is messed up or whats going on

2025-03.title: is this person a poser or actually a true human being in facebook
2025-03.body:
the link above is to her facebook account and you can find her instagram account in her facebook bio

im reaching out because i want to confirm whether she is a real person or not if anyone personally knows her i would really appreciate it if you could comment as that would help reassure me that she is indeed who she claims to be otherwise i cant help but wonder if she might actually be someone elseperhaps even a completely different person like an indian man pretending to be her online

ive never met this girl in person but she randomly added me on facebook at first later i noticed that she was also following my instagram account which immediately raised some suspicions naturally anyone with common sense would be cautious about this kind of behavior but curiosity got the best of me so i decided to talk to her

from our conversations she told me that shes 19 years old and currently living in manila philippineswhich is interesting because i also live in the philippines meaning were relatively close however something about her just feels off

one of the biggest red flags is that she refuses to answer my calls even though weve been talking for more than two weeks now whenever i ask to call she always comes up with an excuse to avoid it for example she once said oh im sorry but im currently with my mom in the living room itd be awkward to be calling now right haha while this might sound reasonable once or twice she says something similar every time i bring it up which is very suspicious

now this is where things get a bit more personal weve exchanged intimate pictures with each otherincluding photos that show her face but lets be realwho in their right mind would do that with a stranger online it just doesnt seem normal which makes me question things even more

so if anyone here actually knows her in real life please let me know your input would be incredibly helpful and ill be looking forward to your responses thanks in advance

2025-03.title: messenger wont play videos on facebook app anymore already tried a few fixes
2025-03.body: today i updated my apps and that may have broke the app somehow anyways im on ios but my buddy and i send clips back and forth and today guessing after i updated my apps facebook wont go to the vid when i click it in messenger when i click the vid in messenger itll open facebook but just sits on the homepage ive tried restarting phone and turning wifi on and off

2025-03.title: i need help changing my businesses facebook page type it shows as people
2025-03.body: for some reason when i look at my business facebook page link it says facebookcompeoplebusiness whereas some pages just have facebookcombusiness is there anyway to fix this thanks

2025-03.title: is there any way to permanently remove hate speechbigotryrightwing unwanted content from my facebook feed
2025-03.body:
im tired of clicking not interested and hide all from x every time hateful content appears on my feed i dont engage with these posts besides hiding them i dont comment on them i dont react to them hell i dont even open these as i know kinda how the algorithm works
ok i hide them but this kind of posts keep coming back in different pages i hide all posts from a particular page and then all of sudden im bombarded with hateful content from another five pages i havent blocked yet  
i wouldnt really mind having some rightwing suggested content if it wasnt only  sexist racist homophobic transphobic and all types of hateful memes that do not cater to my values

is this something intentional on the facebook part or does the algorithm really think im a 60 years old trump supporter

2025-03.title: does posting on facebook to combat fox news newsmax and the white house do any good
2025-03.body: i have a fake account on facebook that i use to combat the propaganda that the right wing news organizations spread i make it abundantly clear that its a fake account i look at it as electronic graffiti i comment with posts about trumps meme coin rug pull the january 6th insurrection  or his big lie for example i get the occasional go away troll but my hope is that maybe that one person will see that the wool has been pulled over their eyes has anyone else tried to take on the right wing propaganda machine this way more importantly do you think it might do more harm than good in some way

2025-02.title: laidoff meta employees blast zuckerberg in forums for running the cruelest tech company out there
my dad keeps posting pictures of my baby on his public facebook without my consent
2025-02.body: how can i get my dads facebook posts with my baby deleted he keeps posting angry political stuff and then posting photos of my baby and reposting photos from when she was a newborn he has like 800 friends and gets a lot of interaction with his posts and a lot of his friends are weirdos and actual pervs hes a major narcissist and doesnt care if i ask him to take them down i stopped sending him pictures of my baby after i realized he was posting them i dont even post pictures of my babies face on my own social media i dont want her plastered all over his stupid page what do i do this is really bothering me i tried reporting but theres no option for this specific issue

2020-11.title: important psa if someone on reddit sends you a message or chat saying they can help get your account back and will want your login information this is a scam take a screenshot and report it to the reddit admins and send a modmail to us
2020-11.body:
please note the mod team at rfacebook is in no way shape or form associated with facebook  we cannot help you with anything facebook related

nbsp

i understand the desperation some of you have when you have issues with facebook  their automated process to suspend an account can end up flagging many people with legitimate accounts  so when you post looking for help here there will be some people that will take advantage of this fact and reach out to you here at reddit

i can assure you anyone telling you they can help hack their way into getting your service back are not here to help  they are here to get your personal information period  do not fall for this  take a screenshot

 you can report it to the admins at 
 you can send us modmail by clicking this link
   we require a screenshot  in windows you can click on the windows key and type snip to use the snip tool
   go to 
   provide us that link
